title: 15C.04 RESPONSIBILITIES OF PROSECUTING ATTORNEY.
text:
A prosecuting attorney may investigate violations of section 15C.02. If a prosecuting attorney finds that a person has violated or is violating section 15C.02, the prosecuting attorney may bring a civil action under this chapter against the person to enjoin an act in violation of section 15C.02 and to recover damages and penalties.
In connection with an investigation under this section, the attorney general has the powers listed in section 8.31, subdivisions 2 and 3.
